content:
Heim family

1 Schachna Mendel HEIM               c1760 - 1833 #51 (Sacharia) {census family 330}
 + Bluma                             c1766 (Lewek)
  2x Jozua Salomon HEIM              1790 - after 1850
    + Pessla ROSENBLUM               1795-98 - before 1849
     3x Ezriel HEIM                  1818 #118 - 1849 #1
       + Tauba REDLICH               1820
             banns 1837 #45,  married Jun 1, 1837
        4o Estera HEIM               Feb 16, 1841 #88 - 1841 #102
        4o Rykla HEIM                May 24, 1842 #255
        4o Bluma HEIM                Apr 5, 1845 #140
        4o Pesla HEIM                Jan 6, 1848 #5 - 1849 #274
     3x Joachim Izrael HEIM          1824 #433 - after 1890
       + Leja REDLICH                1831 Branice - after 1890
        4o Hanna HEIM                Oct 1849 Czulec/ 1853 Karmor p Krakow
          * Hersch Fewiel /Filip WOLICKI  1851-52 Warsaw
                married Mar 25, 1886 #33
           5x Jozua Salomon WOLICKI  Aug 22, 1878 #515 - Nov 6, 1881 #536
           5o Sara WOLICKI           Nov 22, 1880 #685
           5o Gitel WOLICKI          Feb 17, 1883 #92
           5o Regina WOLICKI         Jan 17, 1888 #35
        4o Rozalia HEIM              1859 Karmow / Jan 6, 1865 Gorlice
        4o Jozefina/Bluma HEIM       1863 Karmow
          * Salomon BARBASZ          Brodow
                married Aug 27, 1885
           5x Ezryel Mojzesz BARBASZ  Dec 1, 1887 #796
     3o Blume Rykel HEIM             1827 #237 - 1828 #119
     3o Feigel HEIM                  Jul 10, 1829 #277
     3x Schachna Jozef HEIM          Oct 3, 1833 #390 - 1880-1900
       + Sara Lea RITTER             1835 #610
             married Jan 3, 1876 #1
        4x Schia Salomon HEIM        Aug 1, 1863 #283
          + Chune/Hanna EBERSOHN     Feb 5, 1869 Krakow
                married Jul 2, 1889 #81
           5x Samuel HEIM            May 12, 1890 #288
           5x Adolf HEIM             Aug 15, 1891 #573 - after 1929
             + Bluma EBERSOHN        Jun 30, 1891 #445
                   banns 1920 #91,  married Mar 21, 1920 cousins
           5x Pinkus HEIM            Dec 8, 1892 #853
           5o Regina HEIM            Jan 15, 1896 #34
           5x Leopold HEIM           Feb 13, 1899 #112
        4x Lieber (Leopold) HAIM     Nov 23, 1864 (1865 #204)
          + Laura ROSENTHAL          Sep 2, 1865 (1866 #185)
                married Oct 4, 1892 #133
           5o Marya Olga HAIM        Dec 10, 1895 #808
           5o Zofia HAIM             Dec 30, 1896 #930
        4o Peppi Rosa HEIM           Jan 24, 1866 #99 - 1868 #155
        4o Amalia (Malka/Marya) HAIM  1867* #255
        4o Regine HEIM               1869 #140
        4x Jakob Mendel HEIM (twin)  Jun 21, 1871 #447
        4o Jetta HEIM (twin)         Jun 21, 1871 #447 - Oct 12, 1871 #327
        4o Roza HEIM                 Apr 26, 1874 #296
        4o Anna HEIM                 Apr 18, 1877 #314
  2x Jakob Mendel HEIM               1822 #51
    + Chai Faigla KURZ               1826 #127 - Jun 4, 1889 #208
     3o Estera HAIM                  Nov 17, 1850 #478 - 1851 #125
     3x son HAIM                     - 1852 #267
     3x son CHAIM                    - 1854 #220
     3x Jozef Szyja HEIM             Feb 13, 1856 #161
       + Freida STEINER              Jun 2, 1863 #235
             married Apr 24, 1884 #39
        4x Szymon HEIM               Feb 20, 1887 #108
     3x Ezryel HEIM                  Oct 13, 1860 #2645
     3x Isaak HEIM                   Mar 9, 1863 #134 - Jul 24, 1866 #333




     Jakob Mendel HEIM               1796 - 1820 #127
    + Gutli                          c1799 (Rubin)
     3x Rubin Lebel HEIM             1819 #115
